_description: Carmina: a Bele Aeliz poem — two quatrains abab and two lines, probably incomplete

BodLauMis609.First Lines: In aprell and in Maywhen hartys be all mery…
BodLauMis609.Last Lines:
…She was nothyng dysmaydHyr cowntenance was ffull
                    lygth
BodLauMis609.Editions:
Coxe,  Henry Octavius. 
             Catalogus Codices Laudiani.
         Oxon: e Typographeo academico, 1858: 432 (lines 1-8 only).
Frankis,  P. J. 
             “Two Minor French Lyric Forms in English.” 
             Neuphilologische Mitteilungen
         60 (1959): 66-71: 70.
Davies,  Reginald Thorne. 
             Medieval English Lyrics: a critical anthology.
         London, 1963; Evanston, IL: Northwestern UP, 1964: 212.
